channel.title: Vulnhub on Mateusz Suszczyk
channel.description: Recent content in Vulnhub on Mateusz Suszczyk

item.title: Photographer
item.description: This machine was developed to prepare for OSCP. It is boot2root, tested on VirtualBox (but works on VMWare) and has two flags: user.txt and proof.txt.

item.title: dc-1
item.description: There are five flags in total, but the ultimate goal is to find and read the flag in root’s home directory. You don’t even need to be root to do this, however, you will require root privileges. Depending on your skill level, you may be able to skip finding most of these flags and go straight for root.

item.title: ha-wordy
item.description: As this is a wordpress based lab, it is designed so that users can practice following vulnerabilities: - LFI - RFI - CSRF - File Upload - SQL
